subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A wrist injury robbed Jayson Werth of some of his prime, but the Nationals bought the rest. He starts a seven-year, $126 million contract this season.
snippet: A wrist injury robbed Jayson Werth of some of his prime, but the Nationals bought the rest. He starts a seven-year, $126 million contract this season.
